name: Spirit Showdown
description:
Post Jam Version (with QOL bug fixes):

https://chrisholtshouser.itch.io/spirit-showdown-post-jam

How To Play:

Collect and combine elemental upgrades to use a variety of attacks. You win by knocking your opponents off the stage until they run out of stock. Unlike most Character Brawlers, the characters are not pre-chosen, but develop as you play, and damage does not increase knockback. 

Combinations:

Air + Fire = Lightning

Air + Water = Snow

Air + Earth = Sand

Fire + Water = Steam

Fire + Earth = Lava

Water + Earth = Plant

Most abilities are used by tapping the fast or slow attack button, though some can be charged by holding it.

Multiplayer Requires 1+ Controllers

Controls:

Player 1 Keyboard:

Move: WASD

Fast Attack: J

Slow Attack: K

Jump: SPACE

Sprint: SHIFT

Restart: BACKSPACE

Other Players, controllers:

Move: Left Stick

Fast Attack: A

Slow Attack: B

Jump: Y

Sprint: Right Trigger
